projects.title: Graduate Research Assistant
projects.description: I am currently a Research assistant at the embedded Systems Laboratory at Purdue. I am designing a end-to-end hardware security system for autonomous systems as a part of the Cognisense JUMP 2.0 center.

projects.title: Hardware Engineering Intern
projects.description: Understood the design architecture and performed DFM analysis for PCBs used in Cisco access space routers

projects.title: Technical Head
projects.description:
Designed End-to-End detailed Technical Architecture for the autonomous drone that took part in the Student Unmanned Aerial Systems (SUAS) 2022 competition held in Maryland, US. 
 Led and guided a team of 50+ undergraduates for the development of the entire drone system, including both hardware and software components.

projects.title: Research Intern
projects.description: Designed CAN and RS485 shield for STM32 G474 for Stoch3 quadruped.
